text: Taiwanese entertainer Jolin Tsai () has appeared in 177 music videos, 6 concert videos, 1 documentary video, and 3 music video compilations. In 1999, Tsai signed a recoding contract with Universal Music Taiwan, and released her first music video of "I Know You're Feeling Blue". In 2000, Tsai released her first concert video 1019 I Can Concert, and released her first music video compilation Don't Stop. In 2001, she released her second concert video Show Your Love Concert, and released her second music video compilation Show Your Love. In 2002, Tsai released her third music video compilation Lucky Number. In the same year, Tsai signed a recording contract with Sony Music Taiwan. In 2005, Tsai released her third concert video J1 Live Concert. In 2006, Tsai signed a recording deal with EMI Music Taiwan. In 2007, Tsai released her first documentary video If You Think You Can, You Can!. In 2008, Tsai signed a recording contract with Warner Music Taiwan. In 2009, Tsai released her fourth concert video Love & Live. In 2013, Tsai released her fifth concert video Myself World Tour. In 2018, Tsai released her sixth concert video Play World Tour. == Music videos == === 1990s === {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" width="100%" ! scope="col" style="width:30%;" |Title !
